title: Tom Pidcock Leaves Ineos Grenadiers in Bombshell Announcement
content:
Pidcock and Ineos Grenadiers part ways after ongoing reports of irreconcilable rift, double Olympic champion yet to confirm new team for 2025.

Read the full article at Tom Pidcock Leaves Ineos Grenadiers in Bombshell Announcement on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
